newsitem.title: USA: Northwest Teleproductions gets $8.5 mln financing.
newsitem.headline: Northwest Teleproductions gets $8.5 mln financing.

text.p: Northwest Teleproductions Inc said Tuesday it had secured an $8.5 million line of credit from Nationscredit, a subsidiary of Nations Bank of New York.
The three-year agreement pays off Norwest Bank, the company's current lender, and provides the company with a long-term financing agreement, the company said in a statement.

Northwest said the line of credit will supply it with immediate liquidity and operating capital to expand its business. The funds will also allow it to continue developing its content/programming division for the cable, network and new media industries, it said.
Northwest said the new agreement will save it more than $80,000 a month in cash flow.
Northwest provides full-service videotape, film, and creative services.
